thread.title: Lil Uzi Vert Debuts New Song 'Red Moon' Ahead Of 'Final Album'
thread.title_full: Lil Uzi Vert Debuts New Song 'Red Moon' Ahead Of 'Final Album' | Real 99.3

author: Tony M. Centeno
title: Lil Uzi Vert Debuts New Song 'Red Moon' Ahead Of 'Final Album'
text:
Photo: Getty Images
LIL UZI VERT has officially released a new song ahead of what may be their final album.
On Wednesday, December 27, the Philly native released the official audio for their new single "Red Moon" via Generation Now/Atlantic Records. The song gives Uzi the chance to reflect on their evolving love life before the year ends. It's produced by TM88, FNZ, Sid and Slo Meezy with Don Cannon handling the mixing duties. The song arrived two days after Uzi dropped the official music video for the record, which has garnered over 1.2 million views since it was released on Christmas Day.
"Red Moon" is reportedly set to appear on Uzi's "final" album Luv Is Rage 3 . On Christmas Eve, TMZ published a brief interview with the "Just Wanna Rock" rapper in which they confirm LIR3 will be their last musical project following another tour and their appearance in Nicki Minaj's forthcoming music video for their collaboration "Everybody."
"I wanna make music," Uzi said. "I love making music but I don't really wanna make music like that no more."
"I want to make women's clothes," Uzi said after the interviewer asked what he'd do after rapping. They said they've been working out of an office in their house. When asked if their partner JT of City Girls would be involved, Uzi said she's actually working on a line of her own, and it looks good so far.
So far, Lil Uzi Vert has not shared a release date for their last album nor have they confirmed new tour dates. For now, watch the video for "Red Moon" and their recent exchange with TMZ below.
